item.description:
NE ATC+ Members,

We have discussed a Spring retreat for a couple years now and I am happy to announce one! Here are the basic details:

1. This retreat is not like the Fall retreat; there are no workshops, it is just some time to get away from your hectic life and work on your art projects with friends. Think of it as a really long open studio! We can discuss the option of working on a group project (chunky book, atcs, etc.) but it is not what this weekend is intended for.

2. We will have the Art Center at Cape Cod Sea Camps (like for the Fall retreat) but some of the private cabins are not available.

3. Based on the results of a group vote, will be providing our own food and/or going out for meals. See the discussion thread on the Message Board for details and to comment.

4. If 10 people sign up, estimated cost: $40/lodging, $12/art center rental, $13/group insurance, $10/shared supplies = $75 per person (not including meals).

Please email Jen H. at neatcretreat@gmail.com with questions.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Spring Retreat 2013
